001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004
005import java.util.Arrays;
006
007public class TypedVector<N extends Number> implements Vector<N> {
008
009    private final N[] values;
010    private final boolean columnVector;
011    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
012
013    public TypedVector(N[] values, boolean columnVector, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
014        this.values = values;
015        this.columnVector = columnVector;
016        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
017    }
018
019    @Override
020    public int getDimensions() {
021        return values.length;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public boolean isColumnVector() {
026        return columnVector;
027    }
028
029    @Override
030    public TypedVector<N> transpose() {
031        return new TypedVector<>(values, !columnVector, typeSupport);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public TypedMatrix<N> asMatrix() {
036        N[][] matrixValues;
037        if (columnVector) {
038            matrixValues = typeSupport.createArrayOfArrays(values.length, 1);
039            for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
040                matrixValues[i][0] = values[i];
041            }
042        } else {
043            matrixValues = typeSupport.createArrayOfArrays(1, values.length);
044            System.arraycopy(values, 0, matrixValues[0], 0, values.length);
045        }
046        return new TypedMatrix<>(matrixValues, typeSupport);
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public N[] asArray() {
051        return values;
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public N get(int i) {
056        return values[i - 1];
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public TypedVector<N> multiply(N value) {
061        N[] multipliedValues = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
062        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
063            multipliedValues[i] = typeSupport.multiply(values[i], value);
064        }
065        return new TypedVector<>(multipliedValues, columnVector, typeSupport);
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public TypedVector<N> add(N value) {
070        N[] addedValues = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
071        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
072            addedValues[i] = typeSupport.add(values[i], value);
073        }
074        return new TypedVector<>(addedValues, columnVector, typeSupport);
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public TypedVector<N> substract(N value) {
079        return add(typeSupport.negate(value));
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public TypedVector<N> add(Vector<N> vector) {
084        N[] addedValues = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
085        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
086            addedValues[i] = typeSupport.add(values[i], vector.get(i + 1));
087        }
088        return new TypedVector<>(addedValues, columnVector, typeSupport);
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public TypedVector<N> substract(Vector<N> vector) {
093        return add(vector.multiply(typeSupport.minusOne()));
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public N dotProduct(Vector<N> vector) {
098        N result = typeSupport.zero();
099        if (vector.getDimensions() != getDimensions()) {
100            throw new IllegalArgumentException();
101        }
102        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
103            result = typeSupport.add(result, typeSupport.multiply(values[i], vector.get(i + 1)));
104        }
105        return result;
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public N norm() {
110        N result = typeSupport.zero();
111        for (N value : values) {
112            result = typeSupport.add(result, typeSupport.multiply(value, value));
113        }
114        return typeSupport.squareRoot(result);
115    }
116
117    @Override
118    public int hashCode() {
119        return Arrays.hashCode(values) * (columnVector ? -1 : 1);
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
124        if (obj == this) {
125            return true;
126        }
127        if (obj instanceof TypedVector<?> v) {
128            return columnVector == v.columnVector && Arrays.equals(values, v.values);
129        } else {
130            return false;
131        }
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    public void print() {
136        print(null);
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public void print(String name) {
141        asMatrix().print(name);
142    }
143
144    @Override
145    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
146        return typeSupport;
147    }
148}
